duties_responsibilities.duty: Efficiently procure raw materials and components based on price and schedule demand to ensure delivery prior to the production start date.
Research new suppliers when necessary and maintain working relationships with current and new suppliers through regular communication.
Monitor supply levels based on part usage, quantities, and material lead times, and collaborate with suppliers to maintain delivery schedules.
Prepare and issue purchase orders (POs) in conjunction with the Planning/Procurement Team to vendors using approved documentation and systems for submission.
Reconcile and close out POs and procurement transactions using the ERP system, and troubleshoot reconciliation issues with the internal planning/procurement team.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Supply Chain, Business, or related field
